Description:
IN - 312378239 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety, and welfare at work of all your employees and also that persons not in your employment who may be affected thereby are not thereby exposed to risks to their health and safety as you have failed to appoint one or more competent persons to assist you in undertaking the measures you need to take to comply with the requirements and prohibitions imposed upon you by or under the relevant statutory provisions.
IN - 312378254 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety, and welfare at work of all your employees and also that person not in your employment who may be affected thereby are not thereby exposed to risks to their health and safety as you have failed to ensure every floor in a workplace and the surface of every traffic route in a workplace shall be kept free from obstructions and from any article or substance which may cause a person to slip, trip or fall.
There were significant amounts of paper debris in the walkways of the production areas and walkways.
IN - 312378260 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety, and welfare at work of all your employees who are operating machinery (including access to the dangerous moving parts of PM2 and the converting operating line). You have not: provided and maintained plant and systems of work that are safe and without risk to health as safeguarding arrangements are in need of fundamental review to ensure effective measures are in place to prevent access to danger.
